name: Ocean's Lonewolf
description:
Everyone has been killed except you, and you must complete the mission and assassinate their captain.

Control:

[Z] Dive

[C] Swim Up

[X] Fire

[LEFT/RIGHT] TURN

[UP/DOWN] Moving

Also the game support Gamepad.

It's our first 3D Godot game, created by me and @MikadoSc for Godot Wild Jam #41's Ocean theme!

Because of the limited time, the game is very simple and brief; all you need to do is complete the first two levels and defeat the final boss at the end.

We had a great time developing the game, and a special thanks to Kenney for providing such an amazing and simple tool for creating game models.
